attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the ratification of the Lisbon treaty without the democratic mandate of the people, we the undersigned want December 1st, the day when the Lisbon Treaty came into effect, to be remembered as ‘Treason Day’.

rejection.details: Your petition should request an action that relates to government policy. There are several petitions on the website that relate to the signing of the Lisbon Treaty which you may want to sign.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
